br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.beanvalidation

Class MethodValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.beanvalidation.MethodValidator

  • @ApplicationScoped
public class MethodValidator
extends Object
    Validate method parameters using Bean Validation. The method will be validated if any parameter contains a Bean Validation annotation.
    Since:
    3.5.1
    Author:
    Ot√°vio Scherer Garcia, Rodrigo Turini

      • extractCategory

        protected String extractCategory(ValuedParameter[] params,
                     javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<Object> violation)
        Returns the category for this constraint violation. By default, the category returned is the full path for property. You can override this method if you prefer another strategy.

      • extractInternacionalizedMessage

        protected String extractInternacionalizedMessage(javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<Object> v)
        Returns the internacionalized message for this constraint violation.
